divs: Sighting DetailsI uploaded your picture to my computer and did some minor adjustments to contrast, brightness, etc. I noticed something. These three lights are attached to one single object. In the first pic you can clearly see the edges because of where the light begins, bends and stops. The second picture is where I added some lines to indicate what I'm talking about. Click back and forth and IMO it is the legendary Triangle UFO.
Summary: In response to MD,US ie: 3 lights in a field
